name: Rocksmith 2014: Variety Song Pack IV
summary: Play "Never Going Back Again" by Fleetwood Mac, “I Ran (So Far Away)” by A Flock of Seagulls, “Refuse/Resist” by Sepultura and "I’m Made of Wax, Larry, What Are You Made Of?" by A Day To Remember on any electric guitar or bass. Each song includes a new authentic tone.
